episodes.title: BONUS: On Writing Trauma with Generation Cult
episodes.description: Dhyana Levey and I discuss an academic paper on researching trauma that indirectly impacts the self. Full article available here: Denejkina, Anna. (2019). Writing Trauma. 10.4324/9780429201707-5. Listen to Generation Cult Here

episodes.title: BONUS: Q&A
